parameters.name: securable_type
parameters.description: (string) The type of the securable to bind to a workspace.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of workspace bindings to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: A list of workspace IDs that are bound to the securable

get.description: Gets workspace bindings of the securable. The caller must be a metastore admin or an owner of the securable.
